== Concept ==

The <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|Lubuntu Artwork Team]]</nowiki> is pleased to present you all the artwork for the forthcoming Lubuntu release Utopic Unicorn.

== Wallpaper ==
Continuing the traditional design lines, Lubuntu wallpapers explore a deeper sense of blue with a touch or purple.<<BR>>Don't forget the <nowiki>[[http://picompete.com/contest/results/1441/lubuntu-14-10-community-wallpaper-contest/|Community wallpapers]]</nowiki> (thanks to our friends in <nowiki>[[http://picompete.com/|Picompete]]</nowiki>), those submitted by users and fans!

== Controls ==

Lots of changes here, improvements and a masssive re-merge with the Ubuntu branch. Due to some important changes in GTK3, Light Themes are being updated, so are Lubuntu's, including mathcing controls between GTK2 and GTK3 (no longer look like different environments).  

<nowiki>[[File:utopic_controls.png]]</nowiki>
